availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Butner Tyre in Madison County, Kentucky, on December 29, 1826. Father of William Tyre and Andrew Tyre. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Indicted by the Estill Circuit Court for malicious stabbing. Respited by Governor Beriah Magoffin on January 28, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 329B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 241.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183310, p. 458.
KYR-0001-020-0387
